Através da AppToTest, podes solicitar um autoteste para a infeção pelo VIH, recebê-lo gratuitamente, ter acesso a informações de saúde e contar com o apoio de especialistas.


O autoteste de rastreio da infeção por VIH é um dispositivo que pode ser utilizado por qualquer pessoa sem o apoio de um técnico de saúde. Na AppToTest podes levantar um autoteste gratuitamente numa farmácia e de forma confidencial. Podes também obter ajuda para realizá-lo ou mesmo para saber mais sobre o VIH/ SIDA.


Por enquanto, este é um projeto piloto e os autotestes gratuitos estão apenas disponíveis na região do Grande Porto. Podes ainda assim consultar a app para conhecer mais sobre o VIH/SIDA ou falar com um técnico especializado caso tenhas dúvidas. 


Na AppToTest, podes:
Pedir o autoteste para VIH de forma gratuita e confidencial
Ver o vídeo explicativo de como fazer o autoteste
Receber acompanhamento após os resultados do teste
Saber mais informação sobre o VIH/SIDA
Receber o apoio de especialistas
Ter acesso a contactos de Associações de Apoio em Portugal
Obter resposta a todas as dúvidas que possas ter sobre o VIH/SIDA

Esta aplicação faz parte do projeto AppToTest criado e desenvolvido pela Agência Piaget para o Desenvolvimento (APDES) e financiado pela Gilead Sciences. O projeto AppToTest tem como objetivo principal aumentar e facilitar o acesso das pessoas à auto-testagem para o VIH, promover a literacia e referenciação para os cuidados de saúde.

A AppToTest também conta com donativos da VIATRIS-Mylan e tem uma parceria com a Associação das Farmácias de Portugal (AFP). A aplicação foi desenvolvida pela Tonic App.

A tua opinião é importante. Se tens algum comentário ou sugestão, contacta-nos através do e-mail: apptotest@apdes.pt

Periodizarion is a research tested approach to training used by athletes & other physical competitors of every kind. Research has shown progress improvements of up to 2.5x* in the speed of progress when a periodisation program is utilised vs a standard program that most people do.

Agapé is a relationship wellness app that makes it easy for you to feel and show love! Each day we prompt you to answer a question that sparks meaningful conversation.

Each question is based on decades of research and chosen specifically for you. Agapé’s questions are fun, exciting, and sometimes even spicey! Plus you’re only able to see your partner’s response, once you have both responded. 

Although Agapé is easy and only takes a minute a day, it has a tremendous effect on relationships. 97% of couples that we’ve surveyed report Agapé positively affecting their relationship.

In addition to the personalization done by our question algorithm, you can further personalize your experience by opting into dozens of optional categories. Such as:

- LONG DISTANCE RELATIONSHIP
Example: What do you miss most about your partner when you are not together?

- PREGNANCY
Example: What are you most excited about after the baby comes?

- ENGAGED
Example: If you could make a special wedding vow to your partner that only he or she would hear, what would it be?

- RELIGIOUS
Example: What is a book, reading, passage or verse that had a profound impact on your own path?

- MANAGING FINANCES
Example: What are some of your biggest financial goals or aspirations?

- COPING WITH ILLNESS
Example: What is something small you could do to try to protect your relationship from the stress of chronic illness?

- PARENTING
Example: What is one of the ways your partner really impresses you as a parent?

And more!

WHY AGAPÉ?

Agapé [ah-gah-pay] is a Greek word for unconditional love. At Agapé we believe love is everything. It’s the foundation of all things good in humanity, the catalyst for societal progress and the nucleus of human desire. That’s why we’ve created a relationship wellness app to make it easy for you to feel + show love.

WHAT IS RELATIONSHIP WELLNESS?

Relationship wellness is the process of actively shifting your mindset, making choices, and pursuing activities to strengthen and enrich your relationships, both romantic, familial, and platonic.

A common misconception is that relationship wellness is best suited for those who are experiencing some sort of dysfunction. But just like the gym isn't exclusive to individuals who are out of shape, relationship wellness should never be limited to individuals who have relationship issues.

Everyone should be actively practicing relationship wellness. Agapé makes it both easy AND fun.

IS AGAPÉ FREE?

Agapé is free to download and free to use. You can answer thousands of questions with your partner for free! However, there are premium categories that you can access with a subscription.
